title: Collect and format large number of fashion brand logos
snippet:
I have a list of 174 brands where I need each brand's logo for use in an e-commerce offering.

Examples of brands are:
- http://www.acnestudios.com/
- https://brodiecashmere.com/
- http://cathrinehammel.no/shop/
- http://www.houseofdagmar.se/
- http://www.equipmentfr.com/shop/

The job consists of the following:
- You will receive a list of brands in excel with URLs, but may need to search to find the logo in the right size and format
- The logo image should 1:1 in aspect. You need to increase canvas size on most logos
- The background should be transparent
- The logo should be in Black & White, centered on the canvas with a 50-60 px margin on each side of the logo

- Output 1: PNG in large/original size. The pixel size will normally depend on the size of the logo you downloaded  (e.g 600x600, 850x850, 1200x1200, 1320x1320, etc). No need to resize the image after processing.
- Output 2: is a 350x350px png, max 20 kb

I will give you access to a dropbox folder to store the output.

I have about 20 logos that I need within some days, but the remaining ones can be done over time. There is likely to be a need for further logos along the way, and potentially other simple image processing (cropping of images, resizing etc)
